about: Hi!, I'm Daniel Frias Rosales, PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) programmer starting now in the world of web development with two years developing personal web projects in my free time. I'm very excited to be part of the world of software development and have a great professional and personal growth. In this portfolio I show the tecnologies that I have learned in these two years and the personal projects where I have applied the knowledge acquired. I consider myself a self-taught person, skilled at programming and solving code problems. I hope that the projects shown here and my skills seem interesting to you so that I can be part of your work team and demonstrate my full potential.
